ModulePrefs.title: Include gadget (iframe)
ModulePrefs.description: Include another web page in your Google Site
ModulePrefs.author: Google

Module.Content: <div id='dest' /> <script type="text/javascript"> function doRender(){ // setup variables var prefs = new _IG_Prefs(); var iframeURL = prefs.getString('iframeURL'); var scroll = prefs.getString('scroll'); var height = '100%'; var width = '100%'; if(gadgets.window){ var viewport = gadgets.window.getViewportDimensions(); if(viewport.width){ var width = viewport.width + 'px'; } if(viewport.height){ var height = viewport.height + 'px'; } } var iframe = document.createElement('iframe'); iframe.setAttribute('width', width); iframe.setAttribute('height', height + 'px'); iframe.setAttribute('frameborder','no'); if(scroll){ iframe.setAttribute('scrolling',scroll); } iframe.setAttribute('src', 'https://vafor.netlify.app'); var dest = document.getElementById('dest'); dest.appendChild(iframe); } gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(doRender); </script>
